name: Anand Industries
overview:
Established in the year 2005, at Delhi (India), we, “Anand Industries, Mayapuri”, are one of the leading names engaged in manufacturing and supplying a comprehensive assortment of Rivets, Hollow Rivets, Bimetal Rivets and Trimetal Rivets.

My Catalog : Copper Rivets Brass Rivets SS Rivets Aluminum Rivets MS Rivets Reduced Rivets Solid Brass Rivets Copper Cutting Rivets

Infrastructure”; With the assistance of our state-of-the-art infrastructural base that is spread across a wide area, we have segregated our infrastructure into different divisions of functional areas. These divisions are manufacturing, quality testing, etc.

Our Quality: Leveraging on our quality standards, we have been able to satisfy clients that are spread all across the nation. We manufacture our products in accordance with the defined international standards and norms.

Our Team: Our organization works with proficient & highly qualified team of professionals blessed with tremendous business acumen and vast industry experience. They put all their efforts to maintain the consistency in our growth rate and sound financial position in the market.

Why Us? Due to rich industry experienced and skilled professionals, we have gained a reputed position in the industry among our competitors. Our provided product is quality tested on various parameters in order to deliver flawless range at clients’ end.
